description: This file defines the NotesRepository class, which abstracts local database operations for managing notes. It provides methods for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting notes, acting as a bridge between the application and the underlying database service.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository that abstracts local database operations (and future remote API).

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns notes optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Returns a single note by id or null if not found.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to storage and returns the new id.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates a note; returns true if a row was updated.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note; returns true if a row was deleted.
